summary: This is meant to be used by casual people or second characters that you don\'t want to spend 20 hours crafting and gathering with. The perks are added for compensation of being unable to gain levels (past 65), and since the perks divided into every tree it\'s not really overpowered. The tradeskills are just as overpowered as you want them to be. ^.
descriptionHtml:
/v101 fixes bug with correct settings.. 

Casual Quickstart for Alchemy - Enchanting - Smithing and Novice Level Perks

When used you will have 100 skill in alchemy, enchanting and smithing and
1 perk in each novice skill (18 perks total).

This is meant to be used by casual people or second characters that you don\'t want to spend 20 hours crafting and gathering with. The perks are added for compensation of being unable to gain levels (past 65), and since the perks divided into every tree it\'s not really overpowered. The tradeskills are just as overpowered as you want them to be. 

To use the file, first move quickstart.txt into your skyrim directory. (NOT /DATA)
Open the game normally.
~
bat quickstart
~

Now, enjoy your new game.
author: dragonalumni at skyrim nexus
